properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:17AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for
the following rivers in South Carolina...

Black At Kingstree affecting Williamsburg County

...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers in South Carolina...
Great Pee Dee At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties

The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Black At Kingstree.
* from Saturday morning until further notice.
* At 10:00 AM Thursday the stage was 9.91 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Saturday morning and continue to
rise to near 13.1 feet by early Monday afternoon.
* Impact...At 14.0 feet...Flood waters will continue to affect immediate areas
along the river bed. Rising water levels will also reach Highway 41 at Andrews
at 14.5 feet.
properties.instruction:
People with interests along the river should take the necessary precautions to
protect life and property from the flood waters.

Additional information is available on our website at weather.gov/ilm under the
"Rivers and Lakes" link.
